Translations.Text: O ona verit when ona encounter army ona hold chytro commemorate GOD frequently ze ona succeed
Ona obey GOD Jeho posol a nie dispute yourselves lest ona zlyhat scatter tvoj strength! Ona steadfastly persevere GOD bol those steadfastly persevere
Nie bol those lavy ich domov grudgingly iba show skutocne zastrasit others nasledovat chodnicek GOD GOD JE fully aware z everything they ROBIT

devil zdobit ich robota ich oci said Ona nie defeated any ludia dnes ja boj ona. mat rad skoro mat rad 2 armies faced each inak, he turned jeho heels fled saying ja disown ona! Ja see co ona nie see Ja bol afraid z GOD GOD's retribution bol awesome
